OOC: I think that your post isn't a moding, you just help her to 
change her look.

IC:

Vamprah::

Vamprah woke up and with smile she said "How many time I was in 
stasis? I... My voice "Vamprah surpriced noticed that her voice had 
changed, now it was very diferent than her true voice "What happened 
with my voice Wheeljack?" She looked her hands, her silver metalic 
skin had changed now it was brightest, she said "Where can I found a 
mirror? I like to see my new look..."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Airly, tell me if you think any of this is moding, and i will 
change it.
> 
> :::Wheeljack:::
> 
> ::He goes to his computer::
> Wheeljack: Computer, save memory.
> Computer: Acknowledged
> ::Essentially what he's done is saved Vamprah's old body onto his 
computer, 
> so when she returns from her mission she can be easily converted 
back to her 
> old self.  He takes his new gadget and attatches it to Vamprah and 
presses a 
> button. Her superstructure turns to liquid metal, like a protoform::
> Wheeljack: So far, so good.  Now for the tricky part.
> ::He takes the owl parts Vamprah has found and starts laying them 
out on her 
> liquid form, creating an owl form, and, just as Vamprah asked for, 
she was 
> very beautiful::
> Wheeljack: Excellent. Now to reactivate her.
> ::He presses a button::
> Wheeljack: Welcome, Minerva.
